content:
/>
V.iii.7.5.a
.
Residuals of Venereal Disease or HIV-Related Illness
Do
not
consider specific residuals of venereal disease or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)-related illness to be the result of willful misconduct.
Determine SC for residuals of venereal disease or HIV-related illness by the same general principles applicable to resolution of the issue of SC for other diseases.
References
:  For more information on
willful misconduct and venereal disease, see
38 CFR 3.301(c)(1)
considering claims for SC of human papillomavirus infection (HPV), see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 8.A.2.f
, and
disability or death from use of drugs, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.D
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7 - Genitourinary Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7, Section None
